column4: what's the quickest, lightest  Desktop  i can install on a new server install of dapper ?  and how would i get it?

others will disagree

and i don't know if it is still as good as it was, but tightVNC was a lot less hungry than VNC
like uses less resources
does netstat show vnc running and the port?
can you connect locally?
and is it firewalled? have to ask
see if you can connect from the same box
